name: nuxt-dynamic-markdown
description: Markdown + frontmatter -> dynamically generated vuex stores.
author: sustained <sustained.dissonance@gmail.com> (https://sustained.name/)

scripts.release:major: changelog -M --allow-unknown && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs: Updated CHANGELOG.md.' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m --allow-unknown && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs: Updated CHANGELOG.md.' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p --allow-unknown && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs: Updated CHANGELOG.md.' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
